*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, November 4, 1832. Instructions for locating land*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-04-1832">Nov. 4. 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*After much perplexity I have finally closed the division of the *location_mentioned*Peach point tract*/location_mentioned*, and take the *location_mentioned*lower half*/location_mentioned*, you will therefore chuse your situation*location_mentioned* below the division line which *person_mentioned*Borden */person_mentioned*will run*/location_mentioned*. I shall divide the point into two tracts and you will take the *location_mentioned*upper one adjoining to the division line*/location_mentioned*—that is next *location_mentioned*below the division line*/location_mentioned*—you will lay off your tract in the following manner— Run *location_mentioned*two thousand varas from the division line down the point and then run to Jones Creek paralel with the division line and up Jones Creek to said line*/location_mentioned*. This gives you *location_mentioned*2000 varas front on the Prarie*/location_mentioned*, and the same *location_mentioned*on the creek*/location_mentioned*, and it will leave me a situation below you at the point—this arrangement is final.*/p*
*p*There are so many disposed to make trouble and intermeddle, that there is but one way to do in this *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*to avoid trouble, which is to let no one know any thing about your affairs and never say one Westword to any one, about them—and particularly, say nothing to all or any of your *person_mentioned*neighbors*/person_mentioned*—they do not harmonize amongst each other, and are jealous of each other and of every thing. *person_mentioned*Borden */person_mentioned*will run off your *location_mentioned*tract */location_mentioned*so that I can make the deed. I heard *date_mentioned n="11-03-1832">yesterday */date_mentioned*from *person_mentioned*Emily*/person_mentioned*, they were all well.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr James F. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
